meanings.sent1: The old car was lousier than the new one.
meanings.sent2: The movie was getting lousier as it went on.
meanings.sent3: The magician's lousier trick made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mood turned lousier than a stormy day.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the expired milk was lousier than rotten eggs.

meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, he felt lousier than ever.
meanings.sent2: She decided to stay home from school because she felt lousier than yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The clown looked lousier than a sad puppy.
meanings.sent4: His headache made him feel lousier than a broken toy.
meanings.sent5: The flu made her feel lousier than a rainy day without an umbrella.

meanings.definition: Covered in lice or other parasites
meanings.sent1: The stray dog looked lousier than ever with all the fleas.
meanings.sent2: The dirty mattress was lousier than expected, infested with bedbugs.
meanings.sent3: The camping trip turned lousier when they discovered the tent was full of lice.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house was lousier than a bug hotel.
meanings.sent5: The neglected garden became lousier than a bug buffet with all the pests.
